data.title: Re Al

data.text:
Re Al (レ・アール, Re Āru?) is a professional football team in the Spanish League in the Blue Lock manga. It is known as one of the best teams in the world and home to many world class players like Leonardo Luna and Sae Itoshi. According to Isagi, Re Al is the strongest club in the world[1].

Towards the end of the Bastard München vs. Ubers match of Neo Egoist League, Michael Kaiser gets an offer of 320 million yen to join this prestigious team[1].

Members[]

Trivia[]

Re Al is inspired by Real Madrid.

While the club name in Japanese remains consistent throughout the series (レ・アール), the English publication has changed the club name twice. It was first translated as Real Madrid[2] then Reale Madrid[3] , and now Re Al[1].

Re Al's biggest rivals are FC Barcha.

Sae Itoshi was recruited by Re Al when he was 13[4].
